ing: 1 (7 ounce) can salmon, drained, flaked and bones removed
des: "A creamy spread with salmon and cream cheese. You can add pecans for a twist."
ins: In a medium bowl, mix together the salmon, cream cheese, horseradish, lemon juice, and onion. Chill if necessary until firm enough to handle, then form into a ball. Roll in parsley and/or pecans. Refrigerate until serving. Serve with assorted crackers.
